references: Amending: Ord 45382. Repealing: Ord 47859, Ord 50246, Ord 51914, Ord 53347, Ord 54907, Ord 55294, Ord 55777, Ord 59308, Ord 65063, Ord 65800, Ord 66314. Related: CF 151883
summary: An ordinance regulating and restricting the location of trades and industries; regulating and limiting the use of buildings and premises and the height and sizes of buildings; providing for yards, courts or other open spaces; establishing districts for the said purposes; defining offenses; prescribing penalties and repealing Ordinances Nos. 47859, 50246, 51914, 53347, 54907, 55294, 55777, 59308, 65063, 65800 and 66314.
